metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9483 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description:
Emacs 24.4 allows remote attackers to bypass security restrictions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9483` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

emacs24 - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1
emacs24-bin-common - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1
emacs24-common - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1
emacs24-el - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1
emacs24-lucid - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1
emacs24-nox - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: emacs24 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '24.5+1-6ubuntu1').
